titles.title: RICE Act
Readable Insurance Coverage Explanations Act
RICE Act

To provide for improved access to group health plan and health insurance coverage summary of benefits and coverage explanation, require a joint report by the Secretaries of Health and Human Services, Treasury, and Labor relating to summaries of benefits and coverage, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Readable Insurance Coverage Explanations Act or the RICE Act
This bill requires health insurance plans to annually submit, in a machine-readable file, a summary of benefits and coverage under the plan to the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS). HHS must publish the summaries online.
